column4: i just installed ubuntu 6.06... i have a 19" screen but can't set the resolution any higher than 1024x768. with ubuntu 5.10 it was fine though :(

you have to config your video card correctely
Anyone have moodle installed in ubuntu?

If it has the native driver, yes.
If it has the native driver, yes.

are you in gnome or kde?
